title: Electoral Process (Local Government By-Elections) (Election Date and Time of Poll) (No. 2) Order, 2020
content:
Supplement to the Republic of Zambia Government 55
Gazette dated Friday, 10th January, 2020
GOVERNMENT OF ZAMBIA
STATUTORY INSTRUMENT NO.4OF2020
The Electoral Process Act, 2016
(ActNo.35of2016)
The Electoral Process (Local Government By-Elections)
(Election Date and Time of Poll)
(No. 2) Order, 2020
INEXERCISEofthepowerscontainedinsection125oftheElectoral
ProcessAct,2016,thefollowingOrderismade:
1. This Order may be cited as the Electoral Process (Local Title
GovernmentBy-Elections)(ElectionDateandTimeofPoll)(No.2)
Order,2020.
2. A candidate for election as a councillor in a district and Dateand
ward set out in the Schedule shall lodge a nomination with the timeof
nomination
ReturningOfficeronThursday,16thJanuary,2020,between0900 forelection
hoursand1500hours.
3. The campaign period shall commence on Thursday, 16th Campaign
January,2020,at1500hoursandcloseat1800hoursonWednesday, period
12thFebruary,2020.
4. (1) Thepollfortheelectionofacouncillorinadistrictand Electiondate
ward set out in the Schedule shall take place on Thursday, 13th andtimesof
poll
February,2020,between0600hoursand1800hours.
(2) Apoll shallnot betakenin adistrict or wardif onlyone
candidateisvalidlynominated.
CopiesofthisStatutoryInstrumentcanbeobtainedfromtheGovernmentPrinter,
P.O.Box30136,10101,Lusaka,PriceK4.00 each
56 StatutoryInstruments 10thFebruary,2020
SCHEDULE
(Paragraphs2and4)
ELECTIONSFORCOUNCILLOR
District Constituency Ward No. Name
Lukulu Lukulu 110005013 Lukau
Gwembe Gwembe 109003002 Sinafala
Made by the Electoral Commission of Zambia at Lusaka this 10th day of
January,2020.
JUSTICE E.E. CHULU,
Chairperson
A. C. NHEKAIRO,
Vice-Chairperson
E.J. SIKAZWE,
Member
A. D. SIMWINGA,
Member
LUSAKA
10thJanuary,2020
[EC.101/5/5CONF.]
